text: Kyary Pamyu Pamyu, Real name Kiriko Hayama (葉山 桐子, Hayama Kiriko, born January 29, 1993) is a Japanese tarento, singer, and model. She is often associated with Japan's kawaii and decora culture. She is centered in the Harajuku neighborhood of Tokyo. She is known for her 2011 single "PonPonPon". == Personal Life == Kyary Pamyu Pamyu was born in Nishitōkyō, Tokyo in a traditional strict household. She started modeling and appearing as a junior idol when she was 12 years old while using her real name, Kiriko Hayama. Category:Living people Category:1993 births Category:Japanese singers Category:Japanese models
title: Kyary Pamyu Pamyu
